note:
I'm a content creator with a touch of humility and a nomad crafting a digital empire through storytelling at heart; Yet, a
stubborn and unyielding stickler for Truthful speech and honesty; a fitness ,health and wellness nerd spreading positivity with a large heart.
I'm a proud bookworm, but still cognizant of the fact that to the reading and writing of many books there is no end and much devotion to them is wearisome to the soul.

As such , I'm an advocate of kindness and mental health.
